"use client" import { useContext } from "react" import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext" import "./Layout.css" const Navbar = () => { const { isAuthenticated, isAdmin, user, logout } = useContext(AuthContext) const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() const isActive = (path) => { return location.pathname === path ? "active" : "" } const handleLogout = () => { logout() navigate("/") } return (
